channel.title: Weather on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Weather on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Publish a Python module to calculate weather elements
item.description: #Introduction I have created a Python module wxparams’’ that collects functions for calculating elements related to weather, such as functions for obtaining dew point temperature from temperature and relative humidity, so I will publish it. (Abbreviation of Weather Parameters) Before I started Python, I wrote a lot of scripts to process weather data in Perl, and I put together the frequently used functions related to weather in the Perl module.
